instructions.name: lhu
lbu
addi
lwu
instructions.definition:
var addr = capi_int2uint(rs1) + inm;
 rd = capi_mem_read(addr, 'w');

instructions.name: ld
instructions.definition:
var addr = capi_int2uint(rs1) + inm;
 rd = capi_mem_read(addr, 'd');

instructions.name: fsd
div
divu
fdiv.s
fsgnjx.s
instructions.definition:
let a = rs1<0; let b = rs2<0;
rd = (a^b) ? -Math.abs(rs1) : Math.abs(rs1);

instructions.name: fclass.s
instructions.definition:
let a = capi_float2bin(rs1);
rd=capi_check_ieee(parseInt(a[0]), parseInt(a.slice(1,9), 2), parseInt(a.slice(10), 2));

instructions.name: fld
fdiv.d
fsgnjx.d
instructions.definition:
let a = rs1<0; let b = rs2<0;
rd = (a^b) ? -Math.abs(rs1) : Math.abs(rs1);

instructions.name: fclass.d
instructions.definition:
let a = capi_float2bin(rs1);
rd=capi_check_ieee(parseInt(a[0]), parseInt(a.slice(1,12), 2), parseInt(a.slice(13), 2));

instructions.name: ecall

pseudoinstructions.name: beqz
pseudoinstructions.help: Conditional branch if the Rsrc register is equal to 0.

pseudoinstructions.name: bnez
pseudoinstructions.help: Conditional branch if Rsrc is not equal to 0.

pseudoinstructions.name: bgtu
pseudoinstructions.help: Conditional branch if the Rsrc1 register is greater than Src2 (unsigned).

pseudoinstructions.name: bleu
pseudoinstructions.help: Conditional branch if Rsrc1 is less than or equal to Src2 (unsigned).

pseudoinstructions.name: blez
pseudoinstructions.help: Conditional branch if Rsrc1 is less than or equal zero.

pseudoinstructions.name: bgez
pseudoinstructions.help: Conditional branch if Rsrc1 is greater than or equal zero.

pseudoinstructions.name: bltz
pseudoinstructions.help: Conditional branch if Rsrc1 is less than zero.

pseudoinstructions.name: bgtz
pseudoinstructions.help: Conditional branch if Rsrc1 is greater than zero.

pseudoinstructions.name: bgt
pseudoinstructions.help: Conditional branch if Rsrc1 is greater than Src2.

pseudoinstructions.name: ble
pseudoinstructions.help: Conditional branch if Rsrc1 is less than or equal to Src2.

pseudoinstructions.name: jalr
pseudoinstructions.help: Unconditional jump, stores the current address at ra (x1).

pseudoinstructions.name: jal
pseudoinstructions.help: Unconditional jump, stores the current address at ra (x1).

lh
lw
sb
sh
sw
flw
fld
fsw
fsd
la
pseudoinstructions.help: Load address in Rdest (the address value, not the content)
